short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily encode and decode URLs directly from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The URL Encoder & Decoder Chrome Extension allows you to easily encode and decode URLs with just one click. Whether you're a developer, a data analyst, or anyone who deals with URLs, this extension will save you time and make your tasks more efficient.

Features:
• Simple, clean UI
• Quick encoding and decoding of URLs
• Input validation to ensure accuracy
• Helpful alerts and user guide

How to Use:
• Open the extension by clicking its icon in the Chrome toolbar.
• Paste or type the text you want to encode or decode into the "Input" textarea.
• Click "Encode" to encode the text or "Decode" to decode it.
• The result will be displayed in the "Output" textarea.
